title: Because It’s the New Year!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Hnn~, so good! I can’t stop~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>*Munch munch*.... You’re right, Kasumin can’t stop myself.... Uuu, if this continues, Kasumin will become chubby~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Then, should I eat those rice cakes for you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, no way! Kasumin will eat it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>But you don’t want to be chubby, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uuu.... You’re okay with being chubby, Hanako?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s fine! Even if I become a little chubby, if I follow the training plan that Umi-chan came up with, I’ll return normal!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>....You don’t mean....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s exactly the one you’re thinking about, Kasumi-chan.... But I can’t hold back with these rice cakes in front of me right now!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uuuuu~! Kasumin can’t hold back too! Kasumin will work hard later, so Kasumin will just eat for now-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
